description: Professional one-page B2B SaaS landing page for white-label business management platform
goal: Create a high-converting landing page that showcases multi-industry capabilities and drives trial signups
requirements: 8 sections: Hero, Problem, Solution, Features, Pricing, Social Proof, FAQ, Final CTA
Full viewport height Hero with text animation and floating illustration
Scroll-triggered animations (fade in, slide up, parallax, count-up)
constraints: Must use Framer Motion for animations
Must use Tailwind CSS for styling

decisions.performance_optimization: CSS transforms, lazy loading, image optimization

success_criteria.functional: All 8 sections render with animations working
success_criteria.accessibility: WCAG AA compliance, keyboard navigation, semantic HTML
success_criteria.design: Visual design matches Lovable spec exactly, color palette correct
success_criteria.user_experience: Smooth scrolling, responsive on all devices, animations enhance content
